    • getDepartment

      public String getDepartment()
      Retrieves the department to which the user belongs.
      Returns:
      The department as a String.

    • setDepartment

      public void setDepartment(String department)
      Sets the department for the user.
      Parameters:
      department - The new department to be set for the user.

    • assignPatient

      public void assignPatient(Patient patient)
      Assigns a patient to the caregiver, updating the caregiver's client list.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient to be assigned to the caregiver.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the patient is already assigned to the caregiver or if the patient is null.

    • unassignPatient

      public void unassignPatient(Patient patient)
      Unassigns a patient from the caregiver, removing the patient from the caregiver's client list.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient to be unassigned from the caregiver.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the patient is not currently assigned to the caregiver or if the patient is null.

    • addRecord

      public void addRecord(Record record, Patient patient)
      Adds a new health record for the specified patient to the patient's list of records.
      Parameters:
      record - The health record to be added to the patient's records.
      patient - The Patient object for whom the health record is being added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the specified record is already present in the patient's records, if the record is null, or if the patient is null.

    • removeRecord

      public void removeRecord(Record record, Patient patient)
      Removes a specific health record from the specified patient's list of records.
      Parameters:
      record - The health record to be removed from the patient's records.
      patient - The Patient object from whom the health record is being removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the specified record is not present in the patient's records, if the record is null, or if the patient is null.

    • assignMedication

      public void assignMedication(Medication medication, Patient patient)
      Assigns a new medication to the specified patient, adding it to the list of prescribed medications.
      Parameters:
      medication - The Medication object representing the medication to be assigned.
      patient - The Patient object to whom the medication is being assigned.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the specified medication is already assigned to the patient, if the medication is null, or if the patient is null.

    • removeMedication

      public void removeMedication(Medication medication, Patient patient)
      Removes a specific medication from the specified patient's list of prescribed medications.
      Parameters:
      medication - The Medication object representing the medication to be removed.
      patient - The Patient object from whom the medication is being removed.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the specified medication is not present in the patient's list of prescribed medications, if the medication is null, or if the patient is null.
